nodes.excerpt: Idenati is designed to simplify your experience, to organize everything you do online in one place, allowing you to focus and be more productive.

localize.description: Idenati的设计是为了简化您的体验，将您在网上做的所有事情组织在一个地方，让您集中精力，提高工作效率。
localize.tagline: 在一个地方组织您的所有在线活动

nodes.excerpt: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.
nodes.title: Invoid - Enabling KYC automation & identity verification in India
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 想让真正的用户以最少的流失率入职？我们提供的服务包括身份验证(KYC)，以实现个人入职的自动化，并提升客户体验。我们设想创建一个可信的生态系统，身份是访问的关键。
localize.tagline: 在印度实现KYC自动化和身份验证。

localize.description: 想讓真正的用戶以最少的流失率入職？我們提供的服務包括身份驗證(KYC)，以實現個人入職的自動化，並提升客戶體驗。我們設想創建一個可信的生態系統，身份是訪問的關鍵。
localize.tagline: 在印度實現KYC自動化和身份驗證。

nodes.excerpt: Turn your Slack Channel into a Blog Post with custom emojis. ■ Collaborative writing Write as you chat, and publish to the web ■ Easy to use If you know how to use slack, you are good to go ■ Custom emoji support Use emojis, defined in your slack workspace

nodes.excerpt: CoinGecko provides a fundamental analysis of the crypto market. In addition to tracking price, volume and market capitalization, CoinGecko tracks community growth, open-source code development, major events and on-chain metrics.

nodes.excerpt: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated
nodes.title: Jooseph - Content curation tool for paid learning paths
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Jooseph是一个内容策划工具，供课程创建者与受众分享学习路径。- 从网络上的任何链接创建交互式学习路径--接受付费订阅，并赚钱--发布公告，让你的受众得到更新。

nodes.excerpt: The project aims to provide tools to use during the development process. Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder texts, custom color dummy images, and videos of different sizes. Use generated content to test the layout until the real content arrives. Give it a try!

localize.tagline: 所有帮助加密交易商的加密活动都在一个地方进行。

nodes.excerpt: Perfect Recall is a free app that lets you make highlight reels from your Zoom calls simply by selecting the transcript text. Share these reels instead of written notes as engaging summaries to show ‘what happened’.
nodes.title: Perfect Recall 2.0 - Transcribe and share clips from your Zoom calls for free
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Perfect Recall 是一款免费的应用程序，它可以让您从您的 Zoom 通话中简单地选择记录文本来制作高亮卷轴。分享这些卷轴，而不是书面笔记，作为吸引人的总结，以显示 "发生了什么"。
localize.tagline: 免费转录和分享Zoom通话的片段。

localize.description: Perfect Recall 是一款免費的應用程序，它可以讓您從您的 Zoom 通話中簡單地選擇記錄文本來製作高亮卷軸。分享這些卷軸，而不是書面筆記，作爲吸引人的總結，以顯示 "發生了什麼"。
localize.tagline: 免費轉錄和分享Zoom通話的片段。

nodes.excerpt: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
nodes.title: Webiny 5.0 - Build serverless applications and websites in minutes
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Webiny是一个开源框架，可以帮助开发者在无服务器基础设施之上架构、构建和部署应用。Webiny还附带了一个无服务器CMS，运行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建无服务器应用程序和网站

localize.description: Webiny是一個開源框架，可以幫助開發者在無服務器基礎設施之上架構、構建和部署應用。Webiny還附帶了一個無服務器CMS，運行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建無服務器應用程序和網站

nodes.excerpt: This cloud-based tool will help you analyze your Facebook profile by providing detailed info on who is engaging with your posts! Find who is inactive and delete them with a few clicks. Easily automate friend's request process.
nodes.title: Friend Filter Pro - Remove inactive Facebook friends & know who unfollowed you
nodes.author: Gilbert Ondricka

localize.description: 这个基于云计算的工具将帮助你分析你的Facebook资料，提供关于谁在参与你的帖子的详细信息! 找到谁是不活跃的，并删除他们只需点击几下。轻松地自动处理朋友的请求过程。
localize.tagline: 删除不活跃的Facebook好友，知道谁取消了对你的关注。

localize.description: 這個基於雲計算的工具將幫助你分析你的Facebook資料，提供關於誰在參與你的帖子的詳細信息! 找到誰是不活躍的，並刪除他們只需點擊幾下。輕鬆地自動處理朋友的請求過程。
localize.tagline: 刪除不活躍的Facebook好友，知道誰取消了對你的關注。

nodes.excerpt: Preki is a B2B wholesale marketplace in Latam, where retailers can source goods through a mobile app and direct vendor links. Their mission is to help both retailers and vendors grow their businesses and offer them the tools necessary to do just that.
nodes.title: Preki - B2B wholesale marketplace in Latam
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Preki是拉脱维亚的B2B批发市场，零售商可以通过移动应用和直接的供应商链接采购商品。他们的使命是帮助零售商和供应商发展他们的业务，并为他们提供必要的工具来实现这一目标。
localize.tagline: 拉脱维亚的B2B批发市场

localize.description: Preki是拉脫維亞的B2B批發市場，零售商可以通過移動應用和直接的供應商鏈接採購商品。他們的使命是幫助零售商和供應商發展他們的業務，併爲他們提供必要的工具來實現這一目標。
localize.tagline: 拉脫維亞的B2B批發市場

nodes.excerpt: We are glad to introduce Colorgram - an extension that replaces a white Instagram theme with a new colored one! Just choose a new theme from a list of different themes, apply it, and your Instagram will be painted to new cool colors.

nodes.author: John Tolley

localize.description: 我们很高兴地介绍Colorgram - 一个扩展，它可以用一个新的彩色主题替换白色的Instagram主题! 只要从不同的主题列表中选择一个新的主题，应用它，你的Instagram将被涂上新的酷色。

localize.description: 我們很高興地介紹Colorgram - 一個擴展，它可以用一個新的彩色主題替換白色的Instagram主題! 只要從不同的主題列表中選擇一個新的主題，應用它，你的Instagram將被塗上新的酷色。
localize.tagline: Instagram的黑暗模式

nodes.excerpt: Use data from your APIs, databases, or integrations to empower every team to grow your business’s bottom-line. Leverage OKRs and KPIs to cultivate a culture of accountability, transparency, and autonomy by focusing on your outcomes, not outputs.
nodes.title: Commonality - Turn your data into real results with KPIs and OKRs
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 使用来自您的 API、数据库或集成的数据，赋予每个团队权力，以增长您的业务底线。利用 OKR 和 KPI，通过关注您的结果而非产出，培养一种问责、透明和自主的文化。
localize.tagline: 通过KPI和OKR将数据转化为真实的结果。

nodes.excerpt: Collect Colossal Content. Hypto.io takes NFT collection beyond the digital art space and allows its users to collect HUGE moments in internet history from an exclusive network of creators and influencers.

nodes.excerpt: Plasma.Finance is DeFi dashboard which aggregates the most popular DeFi protocols from different blockchains and allows users to manage their DeFi portfolio in one simple interface. You can trade and buy any ERC20 tokens with your Coinbase or Metamask wallet.
nodes.title: Plasma Finance - The easiest way to invest in DeFi & manage crypto portfolio
nodes.author: Ilia Maksimenka

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi仪表板，它聚合了来自不同区块链的最流行的DeFi协议，允许用户在一个简单的界面上管理他们的DeFi投资组合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask钱包交易和购买任何ERC20代币。
localize.tagline: 最简单的投资DeFi和管理加密投资组合的方法。

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi儀表板，它聚合了來自不同區塊鏈的最流行的DeFi協議，允許用戶在一個簡單的界面上管理他們的DeFi投資組合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask錢包交易和購買任何ERC20代幣。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的投資DeFi和管理加密投資組合的方法。

nodes.excerpt: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-material-ui?ref=producthunt is a free and open-source admin template for React & Material-UI that will help you create amazing websites. ✔️ 100 Handcrafted Elements ✔️ 4 Customized Plugins ✔️ 6 Example Pages Kick-start building your web apps now!

localize.description: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-material-ui?ref=producthunt 是一个免费开源的React与Material-UI的管理模板，将帮助你创建惊人的网站。✔️ 100个手工制作的元素 ✔️ 4个自定义插件 ✔️ 6个示例页面 现在就开始构建你的网络应用吧！ ✔️ 100个手工制作的元素 ✔️ 4个自定义插件 ✔️ 6个示例页面 现在就开始构建你的网络应用吧。
localize.tagline: 用于React和Material-UI的免费仪表板。

nodes.excerpt: Share your remote story! We are excited to introduce RemoteRated, a focused place to rate and review the remote competence, benefits, and tools of companies. Like Glassdoor, for our new remote world.
nodes.title: RemoteRated - Glassdoor for a remote world
nodes.author: Maxim Wheatley

localize.description: 分享您的远程故事 我们很高兴地介绍RemoteRated，这是一个专注于评价和审查公司远程能力、福利和工具的地方。像Glassdoor一样，为我们的新远程世界服务。
localize.tagline: 遥远世界的Glassdoor
